name: Stock Market
author: zach1502#4621
description: This cog allows you to invest in the stock market!
install_msg: Thanks for installing Stock Market! Use [p]market for a list of commands!
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users. This cog does not send data to external services. This cog only stores data relevent to the transactions you make.
